snippet: The authorities will no longer send female adult migrants with children to a makeshift detention center in Nogales and then release them in Arizona, the Homeland security secretary said.
abstract: Homeland Security Sec Jeh Johnson, appearing at Senate Judiciary Committee hearing, says border authorities will no longer send female migrants with children to a makeshift detention center in Nogales, Ariz.
lead_paragraph: The authorities will no longer send female adult migrants with children to a makeshift detention center in Nogales and then release them in Arizona, the Homeland security secretary said.

headline.main: Plan Will Change on Young Migrants
headline.print_headline: Policy Will Change on Young Border Crossers
